DOC.brief_summary: The Danish Hernia Database ( DHD ) register 37 different perioperative parameter . The aim present study use large-scale data DHD uncover risk factor long-term ( 30 day postoperative later ) readmission , reoperation , death reoperation recurrence incisional hernia repair use synthetic mesh .
DOC.brief_title: Late Mesh Complications After 3258 Incisional Hernia Operations
DOC.detailed_description: All principal incisional hernia register Danish Hernia Database include study . The included patient follow 4 year order identify correlation technical aspect hernia repair postoperative morbidity .
